summary: Decentralised Traded Fund - DTF (Decentralised Traded Fund) leverages blockchain technology to create a decentralised investment platform for meme coins, mirroring the structure of traditional ETFs. Investors can seamlessly trade and hold a diversified basket of meme coins through smart contracts, providing exposure to the dynamic world of internet culture while maintaining decentralisation and transparency. DTF's decentralised nature removes the need for a central authority, enhancing transparency and reducing counterparty risk. The platform also offers voting mechanisms, allowing token holders to participate in decisions related to portfolio adjustments and governance. By combining the appeal of meme coins with the efficiency of blockchain technology, DTF provides an investment avenue that aligns with the decentralised ethos of cryptocurrencies.
